metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13666 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Drupal Core. Drupal AJAX API does not disable JSONP by default, allowing for an XSS attack. This issue affects: Drupal Drupal Core 7.x versions prior to 7.73; 8.8.x versions prior to 8.8.10; 8.9.x versions prior to 8.9.6; 9.0.x versions prior to 9.0.6.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
